Lemniscate envisions creating an inclusive
and transformative learning ecosystem.

Empowering diverse learners, our team is dedicated to seamlessly
guiding them into the world of STEM education.
Our unwavering commitment tackles pandemic challenges, delivering
vital STEM education right to students' doorsteps.
Our unwavering commitment tackles pandemic challenges, delivering
vital STEM education right to students' doorsteps.
Empowering future engineers through engaging and inclusive math
tutorials and battery sessions, we're proud to achieve 60% female
participation among first-year students.
Fulfilling the dreams of STEM professionals, we specialize in
deepening understanding and expertise in diverse fields.
Empowering STEM educators with cutting-edge pedagogies, we pave the
way for innovation in the era of AI

Learning at your Fingertips

Lemniscate Institute is a non-profit organization that aims to guide and teach students from diverse backgrounds with subjects both in engineering and technology programs.

As you are reading this, you are probably one of the few people that have witnessed this website’s progress. As such, your feedback is extremely valuable in terms of enhancing and improving this website and its future contents.

Email: lemniscate.institute@gmail.com

Uncover Our Academic Contributions

Our paper harnesses the power of clustering algorithms to unveil potential math
competency gaps in incoming first-year engineering students from the K to 12 program.

https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/10137844
Our paper unveils a cutting-edge method using machine learning algorithms—kNN,
LR, RF, DT, and GBM—to pinpoint the most effective multiple-choice questions
for diagnosing deficiencies in mathematics competencies among incoming
first-year engineering students in the Philippines.

https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/10137793
Our paper introduces a novel multi-criterion decision analysis approach, crafting
a Procurement Capacity Index for Philippine local government units (LGUs).

https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/10137798

Message from the Team

Welcome to Lemniscate, where minds are nurtured and futures are inspired in the fascinating realms of Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM)!

As a collective of devoted STEM professionals, we are passionate about imparting knowledge and fostering growth. Our educational outreach spans from Senior High School to Higher Education levels, accommodating post-graduate students and experienced STEM professionals alike. With a profound wealth of expertise and teaching experience, our team is dedicated to guiding and embracing learners who aspire to navigate the dynamic and ever-evolving landscape of STEM.

© 2022 Lemniscate Institute
